name: SHAPE VOID
description:
SHAPE VOID is a very hard, bullet-hell game. Complete with 6 bosses (and there may be more!) and 2 difficulty levels. Challenge powerful enemies and come out on top in this simple, yet hard game!

disclaimer:  this game was made in 4 evenings, it may have some instabilities (or things that I missed in development). It's not the longest of games, depending on your skill it might take anywhere from 30 minutes to a few hours but your first playthrough will be mostly focused on grinding bosses, so if you are not into that then this game might not be for you.
